name: 0Enhanced3
description: An advanced pixel sorting effect that applies visual transformations strictly within a segmented mask, with parameters for sorting style, rotation, noise, and more.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Minimum brightness level for pixels to be considered for sorting. Adjust to control effect sensitivity.
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Maximum brightness level for pixels to be considered for sorting. Adjust to control effect range.
paramDescriptions.angle: Rotates the segmented area by the specified angle before applying the effect. Useful for adjusting the effect orientation.
paramDescriptions.contrast: Modifies the contrast of the effect within the segmented mask.
paramDescriptions.saturation: Adjusts the saturation of the effect within the segmented mask.
paramDescriptions.resolution: Determines the resolution scaling of the effect for faster processing. Higher values result in a lower processing resolution.
paramDescriptions.noise_amount: Amount of noise to add to the effect, with higher values introducing more randomness.
paramDescriptions.noise_scale: The scale of the noise pattern applied to the effect. Adjust to control noise intensity.
paramDescriptions.sorting_direction: Direction of pixel sorting. Choose between Vertical or Horizontal.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Basis for pixel sorting: Hue, Saturation, or Lightness.
